title.narrative: TOT on Saving Credit and Account and book Keeping

description.narrative: TOT on saving credit and Account and Book Keeping was for 1 time/ activity.This activity is already completed with 25 participants/activity.This training is design to provide training to saving credit group that is formed by project to run their home and community easily and uplift the living style and reduce poverty to some extent with smaller amount of money that is saved in group.

activity-date.narrative: This activity was planned to conduct for 1 time/activity.It has already been conducted.
